item.title: Gujarat Riots
item.description: Subject : Political Science Book Name : Politics in India Since Independence Chapter : Recent Developments in Indian Politics Pages : 187, 188, 189 Pages that were removed (PDF) Complete Book (PDF) Text removed from the political science book : In February-March 2002, large-scale violence took place in Gujarat. The immediate provocation for this violence was an incident that took place at a station called Godhra. A bogey of a train that was returning from Ayodhya and was full of Karsevaks was set on fire.
